body_html:
cupti64_80 library is just an information message. As far as I can tell, it has no relation whatsoever to the issue you are reporting. Also I do not really see clear instructions for us to reproduce the issue you are facing. You seem to have just copy pasted your error message there.

It looks to me like your training code may not be converging. I recommend adding print statements to see what your code is doing.

body:
cupti64_80 library is just an information message. As far as I can tell, it has no relation whatsoever to the issue you are reporting.  Also I do not really see clear instructions for us to reproduce the issue you are facing. You seem to have just copy pasted your error message there.
